Change Log

2010-10-20 Jun

  • iJMA v2.0 released with below interface update.
  • Knowledge::setKnowledge() returns int for whether is successful.
  • Knowledge::setKeywordPOS() is added.
  • Knowledge::setEncodeType() is removed as encoding type is set automatically in Knowledge::loadDict().
  • Knowledge::loadSentenceSeparatorConfig() is removed as it is loaded automatically in Knowledge::loadDict().
  • Knowledge::addUserDict(const char* fileName, EncodeType type) is added a parameter type for encoding type of user dictionary file.
  • Knowledge::encodeSystemDict(const char* txtDirPath, const char* binDirPath, EncodeType binEncodeType) is added a parameter binEncodeType for encoding type of binary dictionary.
  • Analyzer::convertCharacters() is added.
  • Analyzer::convertToHiragana() and Analyzer::convertToKatakana() are removed.
  • Analyzer::OptionType is updated with more option types.
  • Sentence::getNormForm() is added.

2009-09-30 Jun

  • iJMA v1.0 released
Generated on Tue Sep 21 18:34:54 2010 for Japanese Morphological Analyzer by  1.6.1
